label:
This is an in-app notification that is sent to the subscribers of an event post 3 days before the event starts.
You can insert the following dynamic values:

##ActivityTitle## - Title of event
##StartDate## - The start date of the event
##FullName## - Name of the subscriber receiving the notification

template.subject: Default template subject
template.body: Dear ##FullName##, you subscribed to the event ##ActivityTitle## and it will start the ##StartDate##. Looking forward to seeing you there!
